description: Large language models are all the rage, but building scalable applications with them can be costly and difficult. In this talk, we give you a glimpse at the emerging ecosystem of LLM apps beyond just ChatGPT. In particular, we focus on OSS alternatives, like the Llama model family, and show you how to use them in your own projects. We discuss how to leverage services like Anyscale Endpoints in Python to get LLM apps up and running quickly. To demonstrate this, we showcase two application we built ourselves, namely a GitHub bot that helps you with your pull requests, and an "Ask AI" chatbot that we integrated into our project documentation.
title: Max Pumperla - Building & Deploying LLM Apps
